column1: Little Goat Diner////Decided to go for brunch to get out of the same ol northside neighborhood. Had been before
column2: but not in a few years
column3: and it did not disappoint. We started with drinks
column4: which is always the right idea
column5: and the nachos. The nachos with the house-made masa chips are a meal of themselves. Incredible! They need to sell those chips by the bag. You've never had chips like these!
